title: Washington Post to Expand Health, Climate Coverage in Bid for More Readers
sub_head: The plan, which includes the addition of at least 70 newsroom roles, also will expand coverage of social issues, technology and international investigations
body:
The Washington Post said it plans to significantly expand coverage in areas such as health and wellness, climate and technology, part of a strategy to reach younger readers and grow its digital audience.
The plans, which come after extensive internal research, call for the addition of more than 70 positions in the Postâ€™s newsroom this year, Executive Editor Sally Buzbee said in a memo to staff on Thursday.
